properties.displayName: Wusa.EXE Extracting Cab Files From Suspicious Paths
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains ":\\PerfLogs\\" or ProcessCommandLine contains ":\\Users\\Public\\" or ProcessCommandLine contains ":\\Windows\\Temp\\" or ProcessCommandLine contains "\\Appdata\\Local\\Temp\\") and (ProcessCommandLine contains "/extract:" and FolderPath endswith "\\wusa.exe")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects usage of the "wusa.exe" (Windows Update Standalone Installer) utility to extract cab using the "/extract" argument from suspicious pa
